name: XRFrame.getPose
description: The XRFrame method getPose() returns the relative position and orientation—the pose—of one XRSpace to that of another space.

Secure context
This feature is available only in secure contexts (HTTPS), in some or all supporting browsers.

The XRFrame methodgetPose()returns the relative position and orientation—the pose—of one XRSpace to that of another space. With this, you can observe the motion of objects relative to each other and to fixed locations throughout the scene.

For example, to get the position of a controller relative to the viewer's head, you would compare the controller's gripSpace to the XRReferenceSpace of type viewer.
